overview: Isn't the history of our Fatherland a dream? Does it have anything to do with the life of the inhabitants of the village of Novikovo? Here is the ancestral tomb of the once famous Novikov-Kireevs. But on closer examination, it suddenly turns out that everything the Novikov-Kireevs lived by is still relevant today. Not only for the village, but for the whole of Russia.
title: Dreams About Russia
